title: Today in history.

description.value: Discusses the independence of Liberia and history of its founding by the American Colonization society. On July 26, 1847 Joseph Jenkins Roberts declared Liberia an independent republic. Also discusses the signifigance of New York State to conservationists, including its natural history. Discusses its ratification in Poughkeepsie of the U.S. Constitution on July 26, 1788.

notes.value:
Title from HTML header (viewed on July 21, 2003; last updated July 2001).
Illustrated by digitized items from the American Memory historic collections compiled by the National Digital Library Program of the Library of Congress.
Mode of access: World Wide Web.
